Name: Default Guard Mode
Description: Defaults your titan to guard mode when dropped, rather than follow.

ConVars.Name: default_guard_mode
ConVars.Description: 0 - Normal mode behavior. 1 - Default to guard mode. 2 - Default to guard mode in LTS only.

ConVars.Name: default_guard_mode_once
ConVars.Description: Default to guard mode only on first drop rather than every drop. Vanilla behavior sets the default mode only on first drop.
